text:
────
And apparently, that location is close to the sea──

(─Ah...
There's a chance for Sakuya and me to be alone together...)

(Last time didn't work out, but...
Maybe another try here might be...)

(I'll keep an eye on things... but, you know,
Sakuya doesn't seem fully recovered at all~...!)

(If anything,
it feels like things are getting worse...)

(...But then again,
we haven't really had much time together...!)

(Maybe it's bothersome...
I might want to try handling it on my own...)

(Seeing such a lonely expression,
I can't just leave it alone...)

Do you have any uncertainties or
anything you're unsure about? Just checking──
